WELCOME.TITLE: Teach a computer to play a game
WELCOME.STEP_1_TEXT: Collect examples of things you want to be able to recognise
WELCOME.STEP_2_TEXT: Use the examples to train a computer to be able to recognise them
WELCOME.STEP_3_TEXT: Make a game in Scratch that uses the computer's ability to recognise them

LOGIN.TITLE: Get started with machine learning
LOGIN.WELCOME: Welcome!  It's great that you're interested in having an account to log in to Machine Learning for Kids.
LOGIN.ERROR_HELP: If this keeps happening, please visit our help section
LOGIN.TEACHER: A teacher or leader of a coding club
LOGIN.FORGOT_TEXT: Forgot your username or password? That's okay - we all forget things sometimes.

TEACHER.TITLE: Are you a teacher or leader of a coding club?
TEACHER.INFO1: If you would like access for your students, please create a class account below.
TEACHER.INFO2: There are two types of class account - depending on who sets it up.
